output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "George Simion PREŞEDINTE" in the link title, who is a presidential candidate (Position 2 on the official list).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid advertisement reaching 35,000-40,000 impressions, clearly targeting a wide audience.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, evident from: - The question "De ce e nevoie de George Simion PREŞEDINTE?" - The call for change: "Românii au ocazia să o rupă cu partidele care au încălecat România" - Direct connection to elections: "Alegeriile din acest an sunt şansa unică"
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material promoting a candidate, not journalistic content.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured campaign message with paid distribution.
The post clearly meets all criteria for electoral propaganda under Article 36(7): - Directly refers to a candidate (George Simion) - Used during campaign period - Has electoral objective - Exceeds journalistic information limits

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Explicitly promotes George Simion for president - Contains campaign messaging about changing the country - Paid distribution targeting large audience - Clear electoral objective to influence presidential vote
conclusion.message-for-police: AUR - Sălașu de Sus, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propaganda electorala pentru candidatul George Simion la alegerile prezidentiale dupa incheierea perioadei de campanie. Postarea sponsorizata cu ID 1231140648187092 promoveaza explicit candidatura la presedintie a lui George Simion prin titlul "De ce e nevoie de George Simion PREŞEDINTE?" si textul care indeamna alegatorii sa "rupa cu partidele care au încălecat România", avand un evident obiectiv electoral de influentare a votului pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Postarea a fost activa si dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, incalcand astfel prevederile legale privind perioada de campanie electorala.
